citations.narrative:
There are accumulations of brown debris inside the PVC drainpipes around the water nipples for the guinea pigs. Dirt and
debris accumulating around the water nipples can expose the guinea pigs to potential disease infections with bacterial,
fungi, and parasites. Water receptacles such as automatic water lines must be cleaned and sanitized when dirty, and at
least once every two weeks. Correct by June 1, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.30 
   
Watering. 
There are accumulations of brown debris inside the PVC drainpipes around the water nipples for the guinea pigs. Dirt and 
debris accumulating around the water nipples can expose the guinea pigs to potential disease infections with bacterial, 
fungi, and parasites. Water receptacles such as automatic water lines must be cleaned and sanitized when dirty, and at 
least once every two weeks. Correct by June 1, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
